section.title: Leap.Unity.ProximityEvent Class Reference
section.section:
Detailed Description
An event class that is dispatched by a ProximityDetector when the detector's game object comes close enough to a game object in its target list. The event parameters provide the proximate game object. Since:
4.1.2
Definition at line 208 of file ProximityDetector.cs.
The documentation for this class was generated from the following file: O:/GitHUBMINIPRoject/Assets/LeapMotion/Core/Scripts/DetectionUtilities/ProximityDetector.cs
